ygData.subject: Charred Guardian Shield and Shining Star
ygData.msgSnippet: I did the Shining Star quest today, kinda a pain in the butt but it s kinda easy.  I did notice when you get it the guy calls it the Shining Star of Life but
ygData.messageBody:
I did the Shining Star quest today, kinda a pain in the butt but it's kinda
easy. I did notice when you get it the guy calls it the Shining Star of
Life but if you right click it it's call Shining Star of Light. Believe me
ppl the quest isn't hard at all but it can take you a while to finish it.

**************************
Azor
Lvl 18 Human Cleric of The Rathe
**************************

> From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
> yeah sol a....not sure how to get there, <guildmate showed me, but i can't
> remember from just one time....> have to kill something that's totally
resistant
> to magic tho.....): i know that much.....gonna have to get me one....and i
found
> out about the effect on the shining star...it is random, but i haven't
been in a
> situation where it does any good.....clense is supposed to remove all the
bad
> effects on you from what i understand.....gonna have to root myself or
something
